# Nokia 7750 SR OS Filter Configuration

configure
    filter
        ip-filter 100 create
            description "Management Access Filter"
            default-action drop
            entry 10 create
                description "Allow SSH from Management Network"
                match
                    src-ip 10.0.0.0/8
                    protocol tcp
                    dst-port eq 22
                exit
                action
                    accept
                exit
            exit
            entry 20 create
                description "Allow SNMP from NMS"
                match
                    src-ip 10.10.10.0/24
                    protocol udp
                    dst-port eq 161
                exit
                action
                    accept
                exit
            exit
            entry 30 create
                description "Allow ICMP"
                match
                    protocol icmp
                exit
                action
                    accept
                exit
            exit
            entry 100 create
                description "Drop Everything Else"
                action
                    drop
                exit
            exit
        exit
        ip-filter 200 create
            description "Customer Ingress Filter"
            default-action forward
            entry 10 create
                description "Drop RFC1918 Source"
                match
                    src-ip 10.0.0.0/8
                exit
                action
                    drop
                exit
            exit
            entry 20 create
                match
                    src-ip 172.16.0.0/12
                exit
                action
                    drop
                exit
            exit
            entry 30 create
                match
                    src-ip 192.168.0.0/16
                exit
                action
                    drop
                exit
            exit
        exit
    exit
exit
